website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you're looking for a modern, simplistic design.
pros: Crisp, streamlined look fits with contemporary décor
Assembly is fairly straightforward and not too difficult
cons: The drawer is on the small side and doesn't close completely on some units

customer_reviews.title: Love my TV stand!
customer_reviews.text: The item was received in excellent condition. They bubble wrapped the entire box exterior. Pretty impressive and effective. I'm an older F and I assembled this myself. Taking my time to ensure no mistakes :) it took about three hours. Instructions were spot on. Nice clean looking stand...The only drawback, but I'll figure out a camouflage -- is the open back does leave cords exposed. 100% happy with my purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret oh yeah

customer_reviews.title: Ditch the drawer and you have a good looking piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: The only negative I found is that the fitment of the drawer is absolutely terrible; it doesn’t sit flush or level no matter how much you mess with the tracks. The good new is that I think it looks better without the drawer anyway so I took it off. Assembly was fairly straight forward, you will have to glue some things. Overall the material quality is pretty good and I think it looks fantastic in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Just like photo! Delivery was fast and it was shipped with PLENTY of bubble wrap!! Love love love it!! It only took me an hour to put it together. I'm sure if I had help it would've took half the time. Photo shown I have a 60" tv on top.
customer_reviews.author: Happy One

customer_reviews.title: great unique tv stand
customer_reviews.text: I've put together a few tv stands before and I have to say this was the easiest (in the since) to put together. Also, every piece came in perfect shape! really impressed with the packaging as well. it took me about 2 hrs total to get it together by myself,2nd person would of helped a little bit. but for only needing a screwdriver I was pretty surprised at how sturdy it is after all said on done. very happy all in all! also I have a 55" inch on there
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Meier

customer_reviews.title: Love it but have somebody else assemble
customer_reviews.text: Took three hours to assemble with help. All the pieces and instructions were there. Looks nice, I'm loving it but if you can pay the extra to have it assembled for you. Unless you enjoy putting things together then by all means knock yourself out. Be warned while putting the drawer together there are no holes for the nails when putting the wheels on, it's the type where you make the holes yourself while putting it together. Just that part though. There are parts that use glue, never had to do that before.
customer_reviews.author: ebby0110

customer_reviews.title: Good quality/easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this tv stand. I’ll be honest, I’m impatient and not the best at assembling things and this was actually fun to put together! It’s a bit smaller than I thought but it’s the perfect size for a smaller living room. The color is true to the picture. I have a 55” tv on it and I wouldn’t go any bigger than that as it may look odd. The drawer fits nicely and functions great. (I saw a review where the drawer was an issue. It wasn’t for me.) it’s perfect for my space and I’ve gotten many compliments on it! It’s a great piece for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but good enough for my purpose
customer_reviews.text: A little cheap looking, but good enough for my purpose. Unfortunatley some of the wood pin holes were not drill deep enough which caused two pieces of finish to come off. Luckily it was on thr back piece next to the wall. If it was any other piece i would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Drake

customer_reviews.title: parts were delivered damaged, took over a month to ...
customer_reviews.text: parts were delivered damaged, took over a month to resolve, couldn't wait to had to put the unit together with the hole in the board.. been couple weeks and still no new part. will use it for now as is since i'm not sure if i want to go through trouble of taking it apart, hoping that hole does not effect the stability of the structure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful furniture!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I love Monarch Specialties. Their furniture is relatively easy to assemble and they excel in style, affordability, and durability. The prices are unbeatable for what you get, and I strongly recommend these to anyone looking for apartment or small house furniture! My one and only minor complaint is that the drawer didn’t align quite right but it’s hardly noticeable- just something that should be improved. Please note that the “natural light” pic was taken during a rainy day.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon A

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible addition to my living room. I wasn't sure that it would be able to hold my 60" Plasma from the mid 2000's (if nobody remembers TV's back then were outrageously heavy) but it hardly buckled. The gaps between the drawer aren't as clean as I expected them to be when it is closed but it's a nitpick and not really noticeable. Was a pain to assemble as the instructions are just pictures and not exactly straight forward. Make sure you're not near anyone you care about or you might say something in your frustration that will upset them. All in all, very glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Luther

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish and beautiful piece of furniture!
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews on Amazon, that furniture comes scratched or damaged, I was cautious. After few months of consideration I finally ordered this TV stand. And I am very happy I did! First what I looked at was packaging. It was really sturdy, wrapped in layers, I mean LAYERS of wrapping on top with scotch and inside everything were divided with foam. Assembly were quick and easy! I was worring that my 55" TV won't fit on the top shelf, but there are more than enough space for it. I am really happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonfreak

customer_reviews.title: Really Pulls the Room Together
customer_reviews.text: Just being honest, I had my older brother put this together for me only because I was moving and he said he could do that while I put my kitchen together but he took about 30 minutes or so put it together. It is sturdy and sleek and very modern! I have a 50” Samsung in the picture and I would go to 55” with it in the future. And yes, in my photos you can see I’m watch Game of Thrones with the Subtitles on...it helps me stayed focused lolol!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Can be improved but very sturdy and heavy
customer_reviews.text: We got this table for our Samsung TV. Although overall it is well designed, some things can be improved. If the piece of wood that comes on the back part had small wholes for the DVD wires to go through, it would have looked much classier than them showing. The one drawer can have things fall behind it due to the drawer having a low back. Otherwise, the table is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Dede

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This stand looks beautiful in my living room. The drawer in it is not as big as expected lengthwise. I thought I could store all the TV, Xbox and other manuals in this drawer but it's too small for that. I can only store wires or remotes. It was easy to put together but took a while since it's a huge stand. Easy to clean, just use a wet/dry wipe. I don't know how easy it is to clean spills off of this. But since we don't keep any food or liquid on it and don't have kids in the house I haven't come across that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Izzypizzys

customer_reviews.title: bad packaging but good product if its not damaged.
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is terrible. The first one was damaged because the box was completely destroyed luckily i was home to refuse the package. I ordered a replacement also very poor packaging with peices falling out but not damaged i would say you have s 50/50 shot at getting one un damaged. Easy assembly seems sturdy. Decent customer service
customer_reviews.author: Moyerdf

customer_reviews.title: Not for 60"
customer_reviews.text: It would not support 60", 55" or 40" TV's. Shelf slants/bends, no front support, just in the back. Can probably support much smaller TV's.
customer_reviews.author: IsurvivedCostco

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE our new tv stand! I don't know who said it took them 3 hours to put together, it took my husband 30min and the stand is sturdy and has the PERFECT finish! Absolutely love everything about it!
customer_reviews.author: Amna Milbes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a BEAUTIFUL piece and very sturdy. I would say it's an intermediate level build, but if you're used to assembling flat-packed furniture, you'll be fine. The quality of everything from the screws on through were of very high quality. They even have you use some wood glue where the dowels go for some extra security. I am beyond impressed. I'm also usually wary of build-yourself pieces with drawers, but this one is great. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: BT

customer_reviews.title: if I could do it all again I would save myself about $100 and just get IKEA furniture
customer_reviews.text: It looks sleek. I cannot attest to it durability though. It’s about the same quality you will get at IKEA (maybe less?) but for double or triple the price. I’m impressed by the look of it, but I’m wary that it will not last long and I’m extremely gentle and good at taking care of my things. Cheap partial board. nOT Recommended for houses with small children.
customer_reviews.author: Kassie Dyment

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful TV Console
customer_reviews.text: This TV console is Beautiful. It is very sturdy. Easy to assemble, instructions very clear. I do recommend 2 people for assembly as some pieces are tricky to place and one person may have a difficult time doing so. Other than that it is great. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marla

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended if you like modern works of arts and cantilevers. Not recommended for anything larger than 50in.
customer_reviews.text: This looks contemporary as heck. Will this support your 65in TV? Nope but I'm using it for my LG SJ8500 anyway and the top panel is sagging. So definitely do not get this for anything bigger than 50in. It looks nice though and I added a wood block to support the top panel. I suppose you also don't notice on the picture but the TV stand has two front legs and the column in the back supports the rear. Also you should get the Sony 65x900e instead of the LG 65SJ8500. I guarantee the Sony is better (not OLED better) but good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Pete T.

customer_reviews.title: Instructions were bad but good end result
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Came neatly packaged. It could have easily been a 5* buy but in my opinion the instructions were very vague so it was hard to rate it a 5. However once put together it looked extremely nice. No cracks, dents, or scuffs that I can see. It's held up by two support legs and a middle support plank in case anyone is wondering. Without the plank it wouldn't be able to support its own weight let alone anything placed on it. Overall great buy if you are looking to modernize a room or living room.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy, but you might need an extra hand just in case
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great product. Looks exactly like described and was not too hard to assemble by myself. It helps to have another person. My only complaint was that some of the screws (not all) stripped really easily and it made some of the assembly process a little hard. Also some of the holes were not lined up exactly, but it still looks great and I'm happy I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: E. Rust

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten so many compliments on my new entertainment center! It is totally stylish, sturdy, not gigantic and bulky tho. It was a little tricky to assemble (for me) but It is very much worth the time and effort. The drawer is not super sturdy, but I just use mine for extra cords, small things and it works out fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: natasha

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Missing all the parts to put together this gorgeous TV console. Only came with hardware, and nothing else(nuts, bolts, screws, glue, etc). Very dissatisfied, hopefully I'll get my money back after FedEx made 3 "attempts" to deliver.
customer_reviews.author: Hai H. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: This TV stand is the real deal.
customer_reviews.text: The package is heavy. Heavier than I imagined for being hollow core. That's a good thing. This thing is stupid easy to assemble. The drawer is a perfect fit, and slides very easy. This piece of furniture looks and feels way more expensive than what it's selling for. I honestly am impressed with the quality. Significantly better than the build your own furniture from walmart or Kmart. I'd say more comparable to the threshold brand by Target.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased October 2016. Since then, it's been with us for 3 movings. Has survived virtually unscathed! It did pick up a knick or two through the years but in unnoticeable areas, and a small scratch on the t.v surface stand that only appeared this year from my partner lazily pushing the t.v base to turn the screen. still looks brand new and is my partner's personal favorite piece of the home. Definitely great quality and I see it staying with us for many more years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time And money
customer_reviews.text: Now I believe the reviews that says the manual is useless, it's so complicated and it's pure INFERIOR and POORLY made, I had to abandone the whole thing, the worst of it is that it is made of plywood and it keeps breaking
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool design but the shelves will sag.
customer_reviews.text: I really dig the design but it's just not able to support it's self. The unsupported shelves are sagging under their own weight. I'm planning on cutting two wooden dowels to use as legs to help, and I don't think it'll look too bad. I modified mine to better match the room by covering the rear section, drawer front and legs in light wood grain vinyl paper.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Headhunter

customer_reviews.title: Love.
customer_reviews.text: The design is very sleek and modern. I have a 43" flat, which fits perfectly on the stand. It was very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph A. Silvera

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, some flaws
customer_reviews.text: It looks great once assembled. However, a couple of the dowels went right through as you can see in the picture. Also very soft because, while tapping in a couple of the dowels with a mallet, it left a couple of indentations in the particle board.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Traxler

customer_reviews.title: Seems a little over priced
customer_reviews.text: I like the piece. I wish it came in a color that was less taupe, but it's ok. I feel that it's a bit overpriced for particle board, but the result is a nice mid-century look. So if that's what you want, it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Solid and high quality
customer_reviews.text: It is solid. You can tell that if you bought some cheap furniture before and after bought this tv stand and you can feel how much better is it. Looks very ergonomic and style, using it for PS4/controllers table under TV.
customer_reviews.author: FlashBack

customer_reviews.title: 2 legged wonder!
customer_reviews.text: Um....there really are no back legs. I guess the photo doesn't show any, so I get it. My fault for assuming a piece of furniture would have all the legs. It has a flimsy piece of wood in the back, so good luck moving this around without cracking that.
customer_reviews.author: M. Vance

customer_reviews.title: Purchase wood glue and dont step on the boards during installation
customer_reviews.text: The looks are the most Appealing Built Quality tho.. the materials are misleading some boards in the construction are hollow and felt extremely cheap, definitely not durable wouldn't recommend moving it anywhere. The Drawer are not flush no matter how much you Tinker with it. Also would recommend buying wood glue, the glue they provide was a small katchup packet that's going to get everywhere if u open it. And in the picture it looks like the tv stand is being Supported by 4 metal pegs witch its not the 2 pegs u get are aluminum and that's the nicest material used in the Entire construction Over all sick design not 180$ sick
customer_reviews.author: gluf

customer_reviews.title: Stunning TV unit.
customer_reviews.text: TV installation not complete (hence wires). This unit is perfect! It looks great and lines up perfect under my television (75’). It took me an hour and twenty minutes to assemble. Some tips at times the wood looks like the pieces are not together but once you get the screws down it’ll join them nicely. I did have to hit some parts with heel of my hand. A hammer would ruin the surface. The box is also pretty heavy, about 70lbs. I order the dark brown wood and it matches my other furniture perfectly. I’m so happy I ordered this piece. It really looks great! I’ll add an after pic once my TV install is complete.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Great Modern Entertainment Center
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a Modern looking entertainment center this is it. Very nice looking and can hold heavy TVs really well. The drawer is kind of cheap but if you are gentle with it, it will be fine. It was fairly easy to put together and didn't take very long. It came package well and nothing was damaged. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Fil-Am Family

customer_reviews.title: easily breakable in assembling process
customer_reviews.text: As I tried to assemble parts, I found the board was too weak to stand pressure by screwing bolts. The filmed surface with wood was broken down as I tried to screw the bolt in two parts. I cannot recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Seungho Park

customer_reviews.title: A great buy for $100
customer_reviews.text: This was fairly painless to assemble, but like most of these less expensive pieces the instructions weren't perfect. So, just take your time. I did it by myself and had only one problem at the very end, so now the drawer doesn't close all of the way, but it's barely noticeable. Overall it looks good... just as pictured. The sale price was phenomenal, so it was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne A.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! It is perfect for what i needed it for and I am happy with the purchase... The instructions weren't as clear as they could have been, but, once I got started it was pretty easy! My 12 year old son and I were able to get the job done! And, I LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Ko

customer_reviews.title: Harder to assemble than IKEA furniture. Veneer warps with a wet glass easily.
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, i’ll Give it that. It took about 4 hours to assemble. And the top piece was not able to be securitied. For that reason, I set heavy things on it for a few weeks before I risked my TV’s life. (This was harder to assemble than IKEA furniture, heads up.) Also, the veneer (if that’s what it is) is pretty cheap. I set a condensating glass on it for maybe a half hour and it made the ‘veneer’ bubble up. I wouldn’t buy from this brand again. I ordered a desk from the same company, and had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Look very Nice
customer_reviews.text: This TV stand is very nice and I just love it. I have to mention that I initially received a package that was vandalized sort of... It was missing the hardware and #8 & 13... Amazon has the best customer support, I received a replacement in 3 days. Highly recommended TV stand
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this !!
customer_reviews.text: Was missing peices, and the the manufacturer would not send me the peices, Amazon had to order a new one and they made me take the peices that i needed out and return the rest. This is not a small piece of furniture and requires two or more ppl to carry. It was not a good purchase. Dont buy !
customer_reviews.author: Renee austin

customer_reviews.title: Love Monarch TV Stand
customer_reviews.text: Very modern looking, solid white, sturdy TV stand. Streamline and has many shelves to put other electronics, books, etc. Must use extra care when moving it though, I would recommend 2 people. No problem putting it together. Has 2 drawers. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a statement piece for my living room and needed a tv entertainment center with these dimensions. I was back and forth between this one and another one from monarch specialities but these reviews were better so I decided to buy it. It is exactly as pictured! The assembling of it was time consuming but the instructions were clear and easy to follow. I saw a few reviews that mentioned the drawer not fitting but I have no problems with that on my end. If you like the look of this TV console you will not be dissapointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best deal on Amazon!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for under $50!! Took a risk on a slightly damaged product and boy did it pay off!! It’s beautiful, modern, and well worth the price. It will look wonderful once our family room is complete.
customer_reviews.author: Kells

customer_reviews.title: love this stand
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something a little unique, but not crazy. This is just the thing. Was pretty easy to put together, and is super sturdy. I stood on it to put lights on the Christmas tree - that's probably not recommended though, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie

customer_reviews.title: Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Box damaged and put together very sloppy. NO INSTRUCTIONS INCLUDED. Tried to get help on line: asking for crazy info just to show you the assembly. This can be done far easier in every step Mat
customer_reviews.author: mat

customer_reviews.title: Great piece
customer_reviews.text: I assembled this by myself! I’ve had it for almost two years now. Seems durable. It came exactly as pictured. Did not have any scratches or any missing pieces. The directions were easy to follow. It holds my 55 inch TV with no issues!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S.

customer_reviews.title: Solid structure that has some caveats, but works for me
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Pain in the butt to construct (solo). Lovely piece of furniture in the end, though. I bought a 55" TV and it holds up great. The cantilevered design is nice but won't work for everyone, because the back panel that is there for structural support sits almost flat against the wall. Will not work if your outlet is in the center. The panel is 22" from the right side and about 15" across, so it might be useful to measure it out if you are concerned.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Got it today. Just in time for the PRESIDENTIAL DEBATE 😉
customer_reviews.text: Took me for ever to put it together because it was just me and I didn't have a drill until the end. So it literally took me HOURS. But that's not the companies fault. It's beautiful. Sturdy. Worth every penny. Thank God that I went with this. I'm still working on decorating it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Paguaga

customer_reviews.title: Only has 2 Legs!!
customer_reviews.text: Indecipherable instructions. Worse has only 2 legs and will easily tip over. Put my $2000 TV on a 2 legged stand? No way! Pass this one by!
customer_reviews.author: T. J.

customer_reviews.title: I didn't have time to go and look for something really nice, to this is what I wound up with
customer_reviews.text: It's very cheaply made. I didn't have time to go and look for something really nice, to this is what I wound up with. It's fine, it's in the basement and gets the job done. You get exactly what you pay for. On a lighter note, the first one they sent had some damage, so they send out a new one right away, even before they had the old one back.
customer_reviews.author: Gea Hines

customer_reviews.title: Delivery super fast. Was promised 5 weeks got it in ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivery super fast. Was promised 5 weeks got it in a week and a half. Easy to assemble if you've had good experiences with building ikea products. Package was securely wrapped to help avoid damage during delivery. Quite sturdy and great appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Fam

customer_reviews.title: ... stand is very convenient and affordable and looks exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.text: The TV stand is very convenient and affordable and looks exactly like the picture. No issues with delivery; and it only took me of about 1/2 hours to put it together; considering that I am a petite female. The quality seems way better than expected for the price you pay for the product. The material used for the TV stand, do not look cheap and gives the impression of the well made high-quality product. The stand is functional and looks good with the variety of environments and room designs. Overall five stars!
customer_reviews.author: evgeniya shpiga

customer_reviews.title: Love my TV Stand!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tv stand, so much this is my second one! I gave the other one to my daughter. It was easy to assemble by myself, easy to clean. Looks great. Fast delivery. Great seller. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: TANYA M. JACKSON

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect addition to my living room. Sleek and modern with lots of shelf space for storage and the drawer can actually fit a lot of stuff. Assembly was actually pretty easy, even though the directions are a little hard to follow, just read them carefully and you’ll be fine. Took me about an hour to put it together by myself, just needed one other person to help me with one step. It matches my kitchen cabinets almost exactly which is a big plus for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon

customer_reviews.title: I love this, set up wasn't that bad if I ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this, set up wasn't that bad if I can remember. My daughter's friend decided to sit her tail on it and broke it. I still have a TV sitting on it though, a 55 inch. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble sturdy and the price was excellent. Very nice product living room look very modern. Fast shipping more beautiful than i expected. I recomend it
customer_reviews.author: jahaira rosario

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Everybody that has visited our new home loves this furniture! Very elegant and minimalistic. I would buy it again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Gariel Reyes Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Like the look of it but it took a while to get together some of the instructions were a little confusing
customer_reviews.author: stephanie b

customer_reviews.title: Less than 2 hundo, sweet
customer_reviews.text: I like it, looks clean and seems durable. Fits my 55in Bravia just fine but might look a little silly with a bigger tv. Pieces are numbered and diagrams are not too difficult. Took about 45 min to setup by myself with a lithium screwgun.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great modern sleek tv stand
customer_reviews.text: The tv stand has heavy pieces but it is held together by a lot of glue. It looks great and I am happy with the piece, its sleek and modern I'm just worried about when I have to move the item when moving down stairs or just moving in general scared it will break.
customer_reviews.author: laura bridges

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality and bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: I'm remodeling my family room and I wanted a modern TV stand, but I t was so disappointed to receive the merchandise damaged, and I mean the actual item and the box were damaged, but I was even more dissapointed with the seller when I was trying to return it, and they were not helpful. Too many questions, they asked for pictures, and I'm hoping they will refund the right amount.
customer_reviews.author: Lily orellana

customer_reviews.title: Simply gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it. Didn’t come with instructions but we googled it on their website 😊 took my boyfriend about 1 hour to assemble by himself.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Lovely stand.
customer_reviews.text: Holds my 55” Tv and looks marvelous. It was easy to assemble only taking about 45mins with a drill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE This TV Stand
customer_reviews.text: I've set a 40" LG on this with no issues. It is very sturdy and very cool looking. I have the shelf to go with this and it's a great looking combination. Assembly was very easy.
customer_reviews.author: 50Bubbles

customer_reviews.title: Missing a piece!
customer_reviews.text: So im getting ready to start!!! And i dont have a piece!!!! Wow! Missing a piece! Piece #2 to be precise!!!! Will be calling monarch support tomorrow morning!
customer_reviews.author: edith hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful piece! Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I'm still moving in, but I love my new TV stand! It was easy to assemble and I love the way it looks. The only issue is one they've had for awhile now per reviews - one of the holes on the back wasn't cut deep enough and the peg punched a small bulge through the wood. I can live with this. All of the other parts went together without any trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Erin Duvel

customer_reviews.title: Unique Modern Entertainment Center
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a modern style entertainment center. It looks just as good in person as it does in pictures. It was fairly easy to assemble. It took my husband and I about an hour or so to put it together. We have been very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Embrey

customer_reviews.title: The unit is beautiful, pretty sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The unit is beautiful, pretty sturdy. It’s holding my 50 inch tv. Like many others said, the drawer design is off. Mine’s uneven but it doesn’t look terrible just not a perfect fit. The directions at first are confusing but when you follow the numbers it’s a lot easier. It’s also very light. Only 1 star off because of the drawer. Fast shipping too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I could probably sell this assembled for quite a bit more than I paid for it
customer_reviews.text: Had my brother put it together in exchange for letting him stay with me for a couple days. Did Not look like fun putting it together but the end product looks like something that would cost over a grand easy at a furniture store. So it all worked out. Looks clean AF
customer_reviews.author: Brent meyer

customer_reviews.title: Quite satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Quite satisfied. Very nice product, the manual wasn't bad but some parts of the illustration were hard to discern. Overall a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Bice

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this except I wish there was a bigger size to fit my 65in other than it perfect. Easy to assemble instructions were very clear.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: i bet this was amazingly beautiful..
customer_reviews.text: i bet this was amazingly beautiful....I was looking for glossy white and it was NOT. i didn't read the description thoroughly enough. Monarch Specialties is a great company. I bought other things from them. They did let me return it, but I had to pay for the return shipping about $30.
customer_reviews.author: Brodi Kalish

customer_reviews.title: looks good, quality is not excellent
customer_reviews.text: Came without instructions, but you can find on the web. Piece looks fine once set up. Remember, this is particle board... don't twist your screws in too tight, they will crack the material. When assembling, don't allow unsupported boards to support themselves without back piece attached, they will flex. 3 stars for lack of quality and instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Beck

customer_reviews.title: Too small for tv
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this stand to fit my 58 inch tv & it's too small. After putting it together now my tv don't fit
customer_reviews.author: nateish

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful TV stand!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It was a little tricky to assemble but it’s beautiful. The thickness of the ‘wood’ looks great. Love the asymmetrical sleek design.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Lookin Good
customer_reviews.text: It looks really nice especially for the price! The only reason I gave it a 4 (I would give 4.5) was because 2 edges looked like they were smooshed and dented. Most likely from being transported. Otherwise I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tv console,received broken
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, look exacly like the picture. But why I give 2 starts. Because come whit a scratch in the front part. The packing is poor. Un envio rápido y es exactamente como está en la foto. La razón porque le doy 2 estrellas es por qué llegó una de las tablillas rayada y es para la parte del frente. El empacado es pobre.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Negron

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Looks good. I can stand on it and I weigh about a buck 50 so I'd say it's pretty sturdy. Assembly was a little lengthy due mostly to my minimal work space.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure whether to buy this stand or not after reading some of the reviews. But once the price dropped I just went for it.... and I’m so happy I did. Not only did I get a good price but this stand is pretty I love it!!! I assembled it with my 2 daughters 8 and 11 years old and we took about an hour and a half. The instructions are basically just pictures but if you have common sense then there should be no problem. Also it was very well packaged. The only one thing I would say is you definitely need 2 people to assemble. Hope this helps....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Price $$ & Quality was what I am looking foe.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, it just make it look like a personally made. I like that it looks like it's floating off the floor. The price is not high and the quality is nice strong. I have recommend to friend to get as well. AMC Fam.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Conner Sr

customer_reviews.title: damaged
customer_reviews.text: It was damaged pretty bad and unfortunately it took me a while to assemble because I was waiting to get a new apartment so now I can't return or ask for a refund. The instructions weren't clear enough and the drawer doesn't fit good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jhonny Polo

customer_reviews.title: Unexpected Gem
customer_reviews.text: Purchasing furniture Online is always a gamble. Not with this item. It was delivered to my front door and rather easy to assemble. There was a nail head sized chip on the upper front shelf. But easily concealed with a drop of white out. Pleasantly surprised by how great this looks in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: John OB

customer_reviews.title: Modern Entertainment center sleek look
customer_reviews.text: Wife and I picked this and assembled ourselves. It is heavy, durable and sleek we love it.;
customer_reviews.author: Rahil Vora

customer_reviews.title: It still looks good, but I think the drawer should have already ...
customer_reviews.text: This took about 2 hours to assemble. It wasn't too complicated. You just have to take your time. I took away a star for the drawer. for some reason I can't get the tracks to line up, so it's just sitting there with no track. It still looks good, but I think the drawer should have already been assembled with the tracks applied.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Carter

customer_reviews.title: But it's been more than several weeks and it's held up like a champ
customer_reviews.text: When I first built this thing I thought it was gonna fall under the tremendous weight of our 60" TV. But it's been more than several weeks and it's held up like a champ. And the design is so so sleek and modern. I would definitely buy it again. Setup also was HEAVY but really not as bad as one would think given all the pieces that go into this.
customer_reviews.author: Eze

customer_reviews.title: Great look, have gotten many compliments
customer_reviews.text: Great look, have gotten many compliments. The only downside was assembly was a bit tricky, and some of the pieces arrived damaged, which delayed ability to finish assembly and use the product. Monarch specialties customer service needed a fair amount of prompting and follow up, but did eventually send the replacement part needed. Aside from this inconvenience, am happy with the product
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and quite unique. My husband will display my husband's US Navy memorabilia very nicely
customer_reviews.author: HappyWife

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like everything about this piece of furniture. It looks very contemporary and just so nice. Quality and color are great. I am getting so many compliments, everybody loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Unique, modern, and a great deal
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, easy enough to put together, great deal. One thing to note before buying though is that because of the design, the top shelf/surface is only supported on the back and the side. It still seems sturdy tho, and I have a 60inch plasma (the heaviest kind of TV). Took about an hour to put together. 5 Stars cuz it was inexpensive and looks unique!
customer_reviews.author: Corey Jackson

customer_reviews.title: perfect choice
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, but arrived without damage. All the necessary parts were present to assemble ourselves and even though the directions were abbreviated they were adequate if you pay attention to what you’re doing. Great product. Does just what it should do — with a little quirky style.
customer_reviews.author: P. Pazucha

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to your living room
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, great price, study for the most part. Took me about 90 minutes to assemble. Directions easy to follow. Would recommend to others to buy.
customer_reviews.author: ray

customer_reviews.title: Ends are starting to sag
customer_reviews.text: Was nice at first for particle board and laminate, average quality and sturdy enough. After a while the cantilevered ends start to sag and are no longer level. It's not horrible but noticeable. I don't have much on the shelves other than an xbox and a 40lb TV.
customer_reviews.author: R0M30

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but not best quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but not best quality. Easy to set up, however, a few of the dowels were too long and popped straight through the melamine thank God it was on the back. Also, melamine?! It's good for the cost but not the best quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Came in one day with my prime membership! Super easy to assemble, took me about an hour, I’m no handyman at all. The instructions are spot on! Love the modern look of it!
customer_reviews.author: Daun Willrich

customer_reviews.title: Great stand
customer_reviews.text: Great stand. No issues. Looks great. Delivery person was rough with box and messed one of the panels through the box. Company replaced the panel with quickly. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: johnathan c.

customer_reviews.title: I use it in a guest room
customer_reviews.text: I use this in a guest room and have nice linen baskets with clothes in them for my grand daughter. It took me about an hour to put it together. It's from China so the directions were sparse. It's particle board covered in melamine. So far so good. Has a nice modern look.
customer_reviews.author: sjf

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sleek
customer_reviews.text: I love that I was able to assemble it alone it’s sturdy, it’s cute it’s tricky to assemble but once it’s up it’s nice. I can fit my 65 inch TV on it !
customer_reviews.author: Ethnic Mamma

product_meta.title: Monarch Specialties White with 1 Drawer TV Stand, 60"
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteEnhance the look of your living space with the contemporary styling of this art deco inspired TV stand. Constructed with thick panels in a brilliant white finish, this stand features open concept shelving and a storage drawer ideal for media storage solutions. This stand will accommodate up to a 47" flat panel TV.
feature_bullets: Accommodates up to 47" flat panel TV
Each shelf: 47"L; 6.5"H top shelf to middle shelf; 9"H middle shelf to bottom shelf
Accommodates up to 47" flat panel TV
Each shelf: 47"L; 6.5"H top shelf to middle shelf; 9"H middle shelf to bottom shelf

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars923 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
